DigicamCommissioning’s documentation!¶

DigicamCommissioning software is used to analyse data of the DigiCam to perform calibration and commissioning tasks

Installation and prerequisites¶

ctapipe, CTS and CamerasToACTL should be installed. The best is to install them all in the anaconda environement generated by the ctapipe installation.

You will also need the following packages … that can be installed through pip

You can get DigicamCommissioning from https://github.com/cta-observatory/DigiCamCommissioning

git clone https://github.com/cta-observatory/DigiCamCommissioning.git

How to use it¶

To run an analysis script, find or create a configuration file (usually in options/protocols) and run

python script_analysis.py -c -a -d -y options/my_config_file.yaml

the option -c runs the high level data creation step, -a runs the analysis, -d runs the display part, while -y allows to specify the yaml configuration file.

To run a plotting script, find or create a configuration file (usually in options/render) and run

python script_render.py -y options/my_config_file.yaml

-y allows to specify the yaml configuration file.
